title: Villas De Solana
posting_body: Thank you for your interest in our Community !
Please call for availabity first.
Below are our requirements :
* $55 Application Fee ( Non -Refundable) per adult.
* $ 200 Administration Fee
* Surety Bond- (Non-Refundable) staring at $263.00
Our prices include WATER, SEWER, GARBAGE, PEST CONTROL, AND GAS
* 2 Bedroom 2 Bath $ 1,890.00 -1359/ 1583 sq ft Starting (Classic or Renovated)
* 3 Bedrooms 2 Bathrooms $ 2,085.00 - $ 1700/1785 sq ft (Classic or Renovated)
* 4 Bedrooms 2.5 Bathrooms $ 2,395.00 2207 sq ft (Classic or Renovated)
We want to take the time to thank you for your interest in our Community and we look forward to serving all of your needs in your new home!
Our Community is located in Dekalb Georgia, Professionally Assisted by SMP Management!
Offers spacious 2, 3 and 4 bedroom floor plans with many options.
Our community features a sparkling pool, playground, indoor computer room, kids playroom , and gym.
We are close to shopping centers like Kroger, Walmart, Publix & North Side Hospital, as well as public transportation.
For online applications : On our website "Villas de Solana" Trails click "Floor Plans & availability tab" scroll down to the bottom of the page.
Then click the number of bedrooms you are interested in.
Lastly, click "availability" should allow you to apply next to it.
I hope this was helpful.
do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers
